name: Virtual Force
description:
Virtual Force!

Strap into the future, cause you're going for a ride. Fight your way through a plethora of enemies through the eyes of proxy assassins. Blast through destructible terrain and your enemy's faces.

Controls:

F - Kill your proxy / reset to spawn

WASD - Movement keys

Left Click - Fire bullets

Right Click - Throw bombs

Space - Jump, and also double-jump

Escape - Return to title
